components.description:
Two flutes of champagne or sparkling wine being clinked together, as done at a celebratory or convivial toast (“Cheers!”). This emoji tends to spike in popularity during New Year's Eve. 

Samsung’s design suggests two glasses of white wine. Some platforms include stylized links to mark the clinking.

See also Clinking Beer Mugs—and Bottle With Popping Cork for a refill.
components.title: Clinking Glasses

title: Clinking Glasses

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Miscellaneous mark
emoji_net_data.definition: Two glasses (flutes) of champagne being clinked together in celebration. Similar to the clinking beer mugs emoji. For a bottle of sparkling  http://emojipedia.org/clinking-glasses/
emoji_net_data.name: clinking glasses

bn:00085135v: Make a high sound typical of glass
To make a clinking sound; to make a sound of metal on metal or glass on glass; to strike materials such as metal or glass against one another.

bn:00087321v: To drink or imbibe with vigour or relish; to drink copiously; to swallow in large draughts.
To consume a liquid through the mouth.
To consume (a liquid) through the mouth.

bn:00010183n: Kind of liquid which is specifically prepared for human consumption
Any one of various liquids for drinking.
Drinks, or beverages, are liquids specifically prepared for human consumption.

bn:00028749n: A single serving of a beverage

apple_vendor_description: The clinking glasses emoji on Apple devices is a celebratory depiction of two champagne flutes meeting in a toast, rendered with exquisite detail. Each glass gleams with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading, reflecting light with a sophisticated sparkle, and the effervescent bubbles within hint at festivity. The smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges of the glasses convey a sense of polished elegance and joyful connection, making it an ideal emoji for toasting successes, celebrating milestones, or sharing in moments of good cheer on Apple devices.
